mapper.select: select ord.dishid,sum(ord.dishnum) as dishnum ,od.custnum,od.begintime from t_order_detail ord left join t_order od on od.orderid = ord.orderid LEFT JOIN t_dish_dishtype dt on ord.dishid = dt.dishid where od.orderstatus in (0,3) and od.begintime >= #{beginTime} and od.begintime <= #{endTime} and dt.columnid = #{columnid} and od.branchid = #{branchId} and ord.superkey = ord.primarykey group by ord.dishid,ord.orderid

select sum(od.custnum) as custnum,DATE_FORMAT(od.begintime,"%Y-%m-%d") as time from t_order od where od.orderstatus in (0,3) and od.begintime >= #{beginTime} and od.begintime <= #{endTime} and od.branchid = #{branchId} group by time
